description: This file defines a sophisticated AI-powered SQL agent for analyzing racing data, including configuration of models, knowledge bases, tools, and instructions for query generation and analysis.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents the AI agent configured with models, tools, and instructions for SQL query generation and analysis.

methods.name: get_sql_agent

search-terms: tools for SQL and file handling
